posts.author: Rua Blackmist
posts.content: Can anyone help with a pure monk build for amia?

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
AMIA MONK
(MONK 30)

RACE: Elf
ALIGNMENT: LG
PLAYABILITY: PvM 1 – 30

STARTING/ ENDING STATS:
STR – 16 (24)
DEX – 16
CON –12
INT –  10
WIS –14
CHA –08

Hit Points: 300

Skill Points: 132 

Concentration: 33 (34) OR Listen: 33 (35)
Discipline: 33 (40)
Heal: 6 (8)
Tumble: 30 (33)
Spellcraft: 15 (15) cc

Saving Throws (Fort/Ref/Will): 21/ 23/ 20 → 24/ 26/ 23 (saves Vs spells)
Naked/ Armoured AC: 29 (Robe)
Spell Resistance: 44 (Cannot be Reduced)

BAB: 20 (Five Attacks Unarmed – Six Attacks With Flurry Of Blows)
AB: +31/ +28/ +25/ +22/ +19 (Fists)
DMG: 1D20 +7/ 19-20 X2 (Fists)

Spellcasting: Nill
Stunning Fist 30/Day-DC: 27 (33)
Empty Body 2/Day: 30 Rounds Undispellable 50% Concealment

LEVELING GUIDE:
01) Monk (01): Luck Of Heroes
02) Monk (02):
03) Monk (03): WF: Unarmed Strike
04) Monk (04):
05) Monk (05):
06) Monk (06): Blind Fighting
07) Monk (07):
08) Monk (08):
09) Monk (09): Great Fortitude
10) Monk (10):
11) Monk (11):
12) Monk (12): IC: Unarmed Strike
13) Monk (13):
14) Monk (14):
15) Monk (15): Lightning Reflexes
16) Monk (16):
17) Monk (17):
18) Monk (18): Toughnness
19) Monk (19):
20) Monk (20):
21) Monk (21): EWF: Unarmed Strike
22) Monk (22):
23) Monk (23):
24) Monk (24): Epic Prowess
25) Monk (25): Armour Skin
26) Monk (26):
27) Monk (27): SR I
28) Monk (28):
29) Monk (29):
30) Monk (30): SR II, Great Strength I 

SPECIAL NOTES:
Immune to Disease and Poisons
Mind-Effects Immunity
Improved Knockdown
Improved Evasion
+100% Speed
DR: 20/ +1

posts.author: Rua Blackmist
posts.content: Will this also work as a human? Just curious is all.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: Sure! I just took the initiative and now knowing your preference for Elves (and good alignments) i went ahead and make him like that. You can also customize two of the epic feats to your liking (SR I, SR II) if you find the spell resistance already good enough. You can change those feats to acid resistance I and II for a total 20 acid (or fire) resistance. Human would give you 1 more feat and 33 skill points more along with 30 more hp's and lose 1 AC. You want a Human version of it?

posts.author: Rua Blackmist
posts.content: Sure I'll take it. Sorry for the late reply, a lot of stuff came up q.q

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Here is the Human version,

Human AMIA Monk
(MONK 30)

RACE: Human
ALIGNMENT: LG/ LN
PLAYABILITY: PvM 1-30

STARTING/ ENDING STATS:
STR – 16 (24)
DEX – 14
CON –14
INT –  10
WIS –14
CHA –08

Hit Points: 333

Skill Points: 165

Concentration: 33 (35)
Listen: 33 (35)
Discipline: 33 (40)

Naked/ Armoured AC: 28 (Robe)
Spell Resistance: 40 (Cannot be Reduced)

BAB: 20 (Five Attacks Unarmed – Six Attacks With Flurry Of Blows)
AB: +31/ +28/ +25/ +22/ +19 (Fists)
DMG: 1D20 +7/ 19-20 X2 (Fists)

Sonic Resist: 5/-
Fire Resist: 10/-
Acid Resist: 10/-

Stunning Fist 30/Day-DC: 27 (33)
Empty Body 2/Day: 30 Rounds Undispellable 50% Concealment

15) Monk (15): Toughness
16) Monk (16):
17) Monk (17):

19) Monk (19):
20) Monk (20):
21) Monk (21): EWF: Unarmed Strike
22) Monk (22):
23) Monk (23):
24) Monk (24): Epic Prowess
25) Monk (25): Armour Skin
26) Monk (26):
27) Monk (27): Epic Resist Energy: Fire 10/-
28) Monk (28):
29) Monk (29):
30) Monk (30): Great Strength I, Epic Resist Energy: Acid 10/-

SPECIAL NOTES:

Mind-Effects Immunity
Improved Knockdown

+100% Speed

Sorry I didn't get back sooner, a lot of things happened, I was wondering what a human monk for arelith might be, with the same thought in mind?
